title: President Donald J. Trump is Securing Fair and Balanced Trade for the American People â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
September 28, 2018
The era of economic surrender is over. From now on, we expect trading relationships to be fair and to be reciprocal.
						President Donald J. Trump					ADVANCING FAIR AND BALANCED TRADE: President Donald J. Trump is working towards a mutually-beneficial, fair, and reciprocal trade agreement with Japan.FIGHTING UNFAIR TRADE PRACTICES: President Trump is combating unfair trade practices that have gone unchecked for decades. NEGOTIATING FOR AMERICAN WORKERS: President Trump is successfully negotiating and renegotiating trade deals that achieve fairer and more reciprocal trade.
